Articles.Content:
I've noticed an 'artificial gravity' button on my flight screen and a monolith (a la 2001) in my pods.

I'm not sure if they are from the same mod but I have no idea where they came from.

Any ideas?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T14:11:05Z" title="03/30/2015 02:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by John FX**

The monolith might be from Necrobones' Joolian Discovery [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95383-0-90-WIP-Joolian-Discovery-v0-4-%282014-10-30%29). And wasn't there a mod called 'gravity room' or some such?

Found it: [Anti-Gravity room](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105904-Anti-gravity-room-1-11) that's what it's called...

Hope this helps,

Cheers

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T19:27:00Z" title="03/30/2015 07:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by E.Nygma**
